niagara.query_engine
Class QueryInfo

java.lang.Object
  niagara.query_engine.QueryInfo

public class QueryInfo
extends java.lang.Object

The QueryInfo class stores all data associated with a query and provides access to that data. It is stored internal to the query engine.

Version:
1.0

QueryInfo

public QueryInfo(java.lang.String queryString,
                 int queryId,
                 PageStream outputPageStream,
                 ActiveQueryList activeQueryList,
                 boolean remove)
          throws ActiveQueryList.QueryIdAlreadyPresentException
Constructor for QueryInfo objects.

Parameters:
queryString - the query as a string
queryId - a unique query id
outputPageStream - the output stream of the query
activeQueryList - the active query list the query info is to be part of
Throws:
ActiveQueryList.QueryIdAlreadyPresentException - if the query id for the query is already present in activeQueryList
